mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_ACCESSORY_SPECIAL (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ass_card_no ,
accessory_code ,
accessory_name ,
accessory_amount ,
accessory_price ,
accessory_money ,
naturs_code ,
accessory_card_no ,
spell_code ,
wbx_code ,
note ,
is_stop ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{accessory_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{accessory_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{accessory_amount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{accessory_price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{accessory_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{naturs_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{accessory_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{spell_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{wbx_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{is_stop,jdbcType=INTEGER}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_card_no, accessory_code, accessory_name, accessory_amount, accessory_price, accessory_money, naturs_code, accessory_card_no, spell_code, wbx_code, note, is_stop FROM ass_accessory_special WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and accessory_code = #{accessory_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
